dc:title: On Pilgrimage - March 1952
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Explains how illnesses in her family kept her from a planned speaking trip. Describes a walk with a friend through push-cart lined streets in the neighborhood.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 631 1952-03-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
